name: CasparSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on the living room light.”
”Alexa, set thermostat to auto mode.”
”Alexa, open the bedroom curtain.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Caspar Smart Home skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your Caspar Smart Home devices by voice. To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa App to link your Caspar.ai account and discover your devices. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home).

When using the skill, you need established names for your devices. There are two ways to define these names:

1. Use the names that Caspar Smart Home provides to you, which can be changed later
2. Create an Alexa group, like Bedroom or Downstairs, and add the device to the group. More information is available at Create a Smart Home Device Group (http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home-groups)
Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can say the following:

"Alexa, turn on the bedroom lights."
"Alexa, set on the living room lights to 100 brightness".
"Alexa, set the temperature to 72 degrees."

* Color and Color temperature features are currently not supported by Caspar.ai
If you have any questions, please contact support@caspar.ai
